en-AU.summary: Check the arrival time for blue buses.
examplePhrases: Alexa check the arrival bus for Bursley
Alexa when is the next bus arriving for Baits two
en-AU.name: bus-checker-2.0
en-AU.description:
Ask for bus arrival times, and plan your commute accordingly.

To start, just say "Alexa, open blue bus checker".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
